pages.title: Small Clue
pages.text: Fading, as a small and weak organism, feeds on organic blocks placed next to it. Right click with the bottle to place it like a block; you can bottle it again to pick it back up.

pages.title: Concise Instructions
pages.text: Place organic blocks like Leaves, Pumpkins or Melons next to a Block of Fading and wait a while. The block will get consumed and replaced with a different looking variant. Break those converted blocks to get a new resource.
